trans-unit.source: Defines the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicates the applications that use the key.
trans-unit.target: Define a coleção de identificadores de objeto (OIDs) que indica os aplicativos que usam a chave.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: An enhanced key usage (EKU) extension is a collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.
trans-unit.target: Uma extensão de uso avançado de chave (EKU) é uma coleção de identificadores de objeto (OIDs) que indicam que os aplicativos que usam a chave.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para criar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension>

trans-unit.source: After the instance has been created, you can then use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension.EnhancedKeyUsages%2A> property to obtain the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instância tiver sido criada, você pode usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension.EnhancedKeyUsages%2A>propriedade para obter a coleção de identificadores de objeto (OIDs) que indicam que os aplicativos que usam a chave.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension.EnhancedKeyUsages%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"> </xref> classe usando um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"> </xref> objeto e um valor que indica se a extensão é crítica.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if the information to create the extension is already in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor se as informações para criar a extensão já estão em um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>

trans-unit.source: The encoded data to use to create the extension.
trans-unit.target: Os dados codificados para usar para criar a extensão.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the extension is critical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a extensão é importante; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"> </xref> classe usando um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"> </xref> e um valor que indica se a extensão é crítica.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the extension is critical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a extensão é importante; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> contains one or more corrupt values.
trans-unit.target: Especificado <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"> </xref> contém um ou mais valores corrompidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"> </xref> classe usando um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The encoded data to use to create the extension.
trans-unit.target: Os dados codificados para usar para criar a extensão.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de identificadores de objeto (OIDs) que indicam que os aplicativos que usam a chave.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object indicating the applications that use the key.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"> </xref> indicando que os aplicativos que usam a chave do objeto.
